<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get role assignments"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/roles/{id}/assignments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns all user and group assignments for the role. Use include=display to get display names.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"in":"query","name":"include","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["display"]},"description":"Optional parameter to include additional information.\n- `display` - Include display names for users and groups\n"},{"in":"query","name":"limit","required":false,"description":"Maximum number of records to return.\n","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":30}},{"in":"query","name":"offset","required":false,"description":"Number of records to skip for pagination.\n","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
